Configurar Auto Synced Translated Dubs |: Set Auto Synced Translated Dubs || UI
Forçar esticamento na segunda etapa:: Force stretching in the second step:
Número de idiomas habilitados: Informe o: Number of enabled languages: Enter the number of languages to be processed.
Se você quiser, você pode adicionar mais: If you want, you can add more in the file
Caminho do vídeo original: Informe o cam: Original video path: Enter the path to the source video file that is in MP4.
Caminho do arquivo SRT: Informe o caminh: SRT file path: Enter the path to the subtitle file in SRT format.
Qual serviço de tradução você usará? Dee: Which translation service will you use? DeepL is slower but more accurate
Nota: Se você pular a tradução, não é ne: Note: If you skip translation, it is not necessary
Caso o idioma de tradução não seja supor: If the translation language is not supported by DeepL, use Google Translate as an alternative. Ignored if translate_service is set to google.
O nome/ID do projeto no console do Googl: The name/ID of the project in the Google Cloud console. Required for translating
Chave da API DeepL: Informe a chave da A: DeepL API Key: Enter the API key for the DeepL translation service. Required for translation if 'deepl' is selected.
Chave de API para seu recurso de fala no: API Key for your speech resource in Azure (cognitive speech)
O local/região do recurso de fala. Isso: The location/region of the speech resource. This should be listed on the same page as the API keys.
Maque se não quiser traduzir as legendas: Check if you do not want to translate the subtitles.
Check if you do not want to synthesize the audio. For example, if you've already done this and are testing
Maque se desejar interromper o programa: Check if you want to stop the program after translating the subtitles.
Por exemplo, se você quiser revisar manu: For example, if you want to manually review the resulting subtitles before synthesizing the audio.
Observe que para retomar o processo, voc: Note that to resume the process, you must reset to False and set skip_translation to True
Isso melhorará drasticamente a qualidade: This will drastically improve the quality of the final result, BUT see the note below.
Nota! Definir isso como verdadeiro fará: Note! Setting this to true will cause the API to generate new audio clips with adjusted speech rates, instead of just stretching the audio clips.
Isso não pode ser feito na primeira pass: This cannot be done in the first pass because we don't know how long the audio clips will be until we generate them.
Funciona apenas no Google e Azure: Works only in Google and Azure
Na segunda passagem, cada clipe de áudio: In the second pass, each audio clip will be extremely close to the desired duration but a little different.
Defina como True se quiser esticar o cli: Set to True if you want to stretch the second pass clip anyway to be exact, down to the millisecond.
No entanto, isso degradará a voz e fará: However, this will degrade the voice and make it sound similar to if it was just 1-Pass
Principalmente evita que o programa excl: Mainly prevents the program from deleting files in the working directory and also generates files for each audio step.
O código de idioma BCP-47 para o idioma: The BCP-47 language code for the language of the original text.
Aplica-se apenas a traduções do DeepL -: Applies only to DeepL translations - whether to use more or less formal language.
O formato/codec do arquivo de áudio fina: The format/codec of the final audio file.
Deve ser um codec da seção 'Codificações: Should be a codec from the 'Compatible Audio Encodings' section here:
Isso determina o codec retornado pela AP: This determines the codec returned by the API, not the one produced by the program! You probably shouldn't change this or it might not work
Somente Azure: define a pausa exata em m: Azure only: defines the exact pause in milliseconds that the TTS voice will make after a period between sentences.
Defina-a como (padrão) para mantê-la pad: Set it to (default) to keep it default, which is quite slow. I think 80ms is very good.
Observação: alterar isso do padrão adici: Note: changing this from default adds about 60 characters per line to the total Azure character usage count
Insira a taxa de amostragem nativa para: Enter the native sample rate for the voice audio provided by the TTS service
Isso geralmente é 24KHz (24.000), mas al: This is usually 24KHz (24,000) but some services like Azure offer higher quality 48KHz (48,000) audio
Insira apenas dígitos numéricos, sem vír: Enter only numeric digits, no commas or anything
Se a combinação de duas linhas de legend: If the combination of two adjacent subtitle lines is below this value, and one starts at the same time the other ends, the lines will be combined.
Isso deve melhorar a síntese de fala, re: This should improve speech synthesis, reducing unnatural splits in spoken sentences.
Definir como zero ou um número baixo irá: Setting to zero or a low number will effectively disable it
Adiciona um buffer de silêncio entre cad: Adds a silence buffer between each spoken clip, but keeps the speech 9centerized) in the right place so it's still in sync
Para deixar claro, a duração total do ar: To be clear, the total duration of the audio file will remain the same, each spoken clip will be shrunk within it
Útil se o seu arquivo de legendas coloca: Useful if your subtitle file places all start and end times right up against each other
Observe que isso se aplica antes e depoi: Note this applies before and after, so the total extra between clips will be 2x this
Aviso, definir um valor muito alto pode: Warning, setting too high can make the TTS speak extremely fast to fit the remaining clip duration
Cerca de 25 a 50 milissegundos é um bom: Around 25 to 50 milliseconds is a good starting point
Somente Azure: define a pausa exata em m: Azure only: defines the exact pause in milliseconds that the TTS voice will make after a comma.
Defina-a como (padrão) para mantê-la pad: Set it to (default) to keep it default, which is quite slow.
Parece que esse número não segue exatame: It seems this number doesn't follow exactly and seems to have a minimum of around 50ms
Observação: alterar o padrão adiciona ce: Note: changing from default adds about 60 characters per line to the total Azure character usage count
Escolha o Serviço de TTS que deseja util: Choose the TTS Service you want to use, Google and Azure are required by the API
Bark Utiliza 100% de VRAM de uma 3060 e: Bark uses 100% of VRAM of a 3060 and takes an average of 1 minute to generate each line of audio
Bark e Edge não há necessidade de API: Bark and Edge do not require API
Original language is the same as the tar: Original language is the same as the target language. Skipping translation.
Stopping at translation is enabled. Skip: Stopping at translation is enabled. Skipping TTS and building audio.
Skip translation enabled. Checking for p: Skip translation enabled. Checking for pre-translated subtitles...
Pre-translated subtitles not found for l: Pre-translated subtitles not found for language
\nThere was an issue exporting the audio: There was an issue exporting the audio, it might be a permission error. The file was saved as a backup with the extension .bak
Try removing the .bak extension then lis: Try removing the .bak extension then listen to the file to see if it worked.
Payload will be broken up into: Payload will be broken up into
Batch synthesis job is still running, st: Batch synthesis job is still running, status
ERROR: Batch TTS only supports azure at: ERROR: Batch TTS only supports azure at this time
